name: Sorcerous Stabber Orphen: The Witchs Salvation
author: Akita Yoshinobu
content: Orphen and his sister-in-law Azalie are genius sorcerers. They are both studying at [Tower of Fangs], a prestigious training academy for sorcerers.One day Azalie performed a forbidden ritual, transformed into a terrifying monster, and disappeared from the [Tower of Fangs]. Orphen left [the Tower of Fangs] which had tried to erase Azalieâ€™s existence. Orphen then sets off on a journey to find Azalie.
